messages.subject: THE HARTMAN COLLECTION OF JAPANESE METALWORK Christies Auction Catalog
messages.msgSnippet: Hi. Just a heads up for anyone looking for this book. Heck of a deal here. I have no relation to the seller, am just passing along what seems like a bargain.
